title: Workshop Schedule
text:

title: Registration
text:
Registration



Registration for the workshop will close on Monday 17th of November.


Registration is free but a requirement to attend! For space and coffee purposes, please email Josh (joshua.bon at adeliade dot edu dot au) if you have registered but are no longer able to join the workshop.

<p>Loading…</p>

title: Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop
text:
November 26–27th, 2025 at the University of Adelaide
Organised by Dr Joshua Bon
The School of Computer and Mathematical Sciences and Adelaide Data Science Centre invite you to join the Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop held 26–27th November 2025 at the University of Adelaide.

title: Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop
text:
Footnotes


Registration is free but mandatory!↩︎
